website_summaries.verdict: This soft cover has the convenience offered by a tri-fold system.
pros: Nice frame under a soft vinyl cover
The ease of a fold-up truck bed cover at the lower cost of a soft-bed cover
Tie-downs help keep the cover from flapping when folded up
cons: The clamping mechanism on this can be tricky to get to work right

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a few days earlier than expected. Mine is for a Ram 1500 Laramie Crew Cab with the 5"8" bed. It came neatly packaged in a nice storage bag within a sturdy box. The instructions are a little vague but having already purchased a similar cover I knew what to do. It seems to be very well-made and I felt that the price was quite reasonable. I found that I needed to move the pivot screws (of which you get extras) on the rear latch to the next location. Different trucks, different locations, maybe. I haven't been on the road with it yet but it feels plenty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jimreaper

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a price that can't be beat,
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2004 Dodge Ram 1500 Quad Cab bed perfectly as advertised. When I opened the shipping box I thought I received a gray colored tonneau cover, but to my surprise I was looking at a custom cinched cover that protects the tonneau cover if you decide to store it! It was very easy to install, came with easy to understand instructions, extra foam strips and a (under the bed rail) battery operated light. This is a quality made bed cover at a price you can't beat! It looks great and it is very securely held. If you have a Dodge Ram like mine buy one today!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not secure around tailgate very well.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed on 2019 Ram crew cab. Install was rather simple and required only a few tools. The tonneau cover itself looks good and appears to be good quality. Problem is, there is not enough pressure at the center of the tailgate and the cover can be lifted an inch by hand. I attempted tightening as much as it would allow but same problem. This will expose stuff inside and allow water in the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The product is great but the installation not so much.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for one of the vehicles it was supposed to fit. A better description was a vehicle it could be made to fit. Now that it's on, I'm very happy with it (especially for the price). Disregard the advice to line up the side rails with the inside edge of the bed. Instead believe the instruction to get the back of the assembly (the locking assembly within 1/16" of the side rail - Step #5 in the assembly instructions). In my case this required bending slightly both side rails inward at the rear.
customer_reviews.author: lonestarpilot

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a great deal of time researching various truck bed covers, and finally selected this one. It was fairly easy to install, but the engineering of this piece of garbage is HORRIBLE!. It will NOT STAY CLOSED. I have adjusted, and readjusted this cover at least a dozen times, and still it will not stay closed. It is not fun to have to stop on busy roads and risk life and limb for something as horribly designed as this awful piece of junk. So, what I have now is a cool looking bedroll at the front of my truck bed BECAUSE THIS COVER IS USELESS. RUN, DON'T WALK, AWAY FROM TYGER covers!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: I installed it last summer and it is still going strong after six months. Yes it's inexpensive and it doesn't "lock" but we're full time RV'ers and since we bought it we've gone through the full range of temps with freezing rain and snow. It keeps the bed clean and dry and that's all I care about. Rolls up easy and straps down by the rear window allowing full access to the 8ft bed of our RAM 3500. Stays in place while towing our 5th wheel. The Velcro sides are holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to easily and quickly install this myself. When I went to the car wash (a powerful, high-end, ride-thru), I was amazed by how little water got inside the bed. My cats leave paw prints on it and it rinses right off. No scratches yet. It is super easy to brush snow off of it before pulling into the garage. Sure beats having to shovel out the bed each time! Was able to move some office furniture and keep everything dry during a heavy rain. Was able to transport a bunch of catering supplies and food without things blowing around (or blowing out) or getting snowed on.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jones

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic deal.
customer_reviews.text: An impressive product for a bargain price. The fit was spot on and the material quality seems to be top notch. It makes no noise at all driving interstate speeds. This was actually a Tyger branded cover. The included magnetic LED light was a nice addition, but if you have a drop in liner there's nowhere to place it. My RAM already has LED bed lighting so I gave it to my kids. The only thing I had to do was make a minor adjustment to the liner screwed into the tailgate to prevent it from hanging up on the rubber seal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunley Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Never stays latched
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. It never stays latched, I’m a contractor and have adjusted this thing a million times attempting to get it to stay latched for more than 50 miles. If I’m going over 65 it un latches immediately. I figured after a month or two it would stretch out and work properly, but it has only gotten worse. Now no return available. Please spend the extra money on a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover. I received the Tyger branded one that ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine came ups about 30 min ago. Nice cover. I received the Tyger branded one that had good reviews already. for some reason this one is cheaper. It went on easy and the vinyl is nice and tight. Its a decent quality vinyl that should last for many years as long as you take care of it. the only thing I don't care for is the metal supports don't run the full width of the bed. they end with plastic on both sides. I would have liked to see it be all metal especially where it clamps down. but for the price of this cover it is something I can deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zanardelli

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation. Great value. I couldn't see spending big money on a cover. This was priced great and does the job. Truck looks great and it's easy to install and roll. The nylon straps hold it in place when rolled up when you need the bed open and you just unroll it back into place and snap the latch closed. The cross supports stay in place so it's easy to use. I bought this one because a friend of mine had one and it's worked good for him. I like it and now I have more options to use the bed. Things don't get wet so I'm satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product with Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover over three years ago and love it. It is easy to put on or take off depending on my needs and works perfectly at keeping the weather out of the bed. Unfortunately, over the summer, one of the clamps holding the front of the cover became stripped and would not perform. I was thinking of how to fix it on my own when I thought I would ask the vendor on Amazon if they had any of the clamps that I could purchase. They had them and sent me two brand new clamps without wanting any payment! Many thanks to MaxMate Depot for this excellent example of how customer service should work!
customer_reviews.author: TWheelz

customer_reviews.title: Great value; good cover
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Basically 2 screws to assemble the frame and then bolt it to the bed with 6 bolts. Not the most robust top, but very functional. Keeps water and eyes out of your bed. Very easy to roll up and out of the way for larger loads. For the money, this is a tremendous value when you compare against harder tops. I could replace this thing 4 times and still be ahead (and I am not close to replacing it once yet). Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Donoughue

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great cover
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my husband’s 2018 Dodge Ram 1500. We wanted to be able to keep the stuff in the truck bed dry when we traveled and it did just that on a recent trip to the beach. We drove through 2 rainstorms and everything stayed dry. FYI You will need 2 people to install it. And you also need 2 people to roll it all the way up. But that is to be expected. We have had it for 2 months now and it is holding up well in the hot Georgia sun. We would definitely recommend this budget friendly option to a friend. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a hard tri-fold but they were expensive. This one looks great and seems to be durable (I’ve had for 3months now). I did not install the rubber (gasket) along the edges. After record snowfall this year, the bed of my truck still stayed completely dry! I would recommend this cover. Was easy to install completely by myself and I have a torn rotator cuff!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Suttle

customer_reviews.title: Would not stay closed at highway speeds
customer_reviews.text: I installed the item and it looked great for a few days. As I got up to highway speeds (70+ mph), the cover would come undone and then start flapping. I adjusted the installation several times including all the trouble shooting in the installation guide. The item still kept failing at higher speed. Item returned. Would recommend a tri-fold style over the roll-out for a cheap self installed cover.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick N.

customer_reviews.title: Great tonneau cover for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I literally installed this in 15 min and was able to move it to another truck with absolutely no issues. The good: It keeps 99.4% of the rain water out of the bed. It keeps people from seeing bodies you may be transporting and when it's rolled up it's completely out of the way. The bad: If the bed rails are even minutely uneven or too far apart the lock doesn't work so it'll pop open. Only issue with this is it looks like a little spoiler and everyone wants to race you.
customer_reviews.author: Alain M.

customer_reviews.title: No water in the bed of my truck.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new 2018 RAM back in June. live in SW Pennsylvania and the weather can go from 60s and sunny to low 30s with driving wind and snow in the forecast in a day, much like it did today. My truck sits outside 24/7 and this cover has kept the bed as dry and clean as the day I brought it home. The weather stripping included sealed really well. It is showing some weathering but that is to be expected. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cerqua

customer_reviews.title: Seller lives up to warranty claims and product works well.
customer_reviews.text: Product fits great. I had this for about a year when the screw for the clamp next to the tailgate snapped. I believe it may have been my fault during installation as I had it two tight. However the seller was great and got the new part to me the next day. I recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Hergott

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on 2014 Ram 1500 Crew with 5'8" bed
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on 2014 Ram Crew Cab with 5'8" bed. Easy to install, took about 20 minutes. Looks great on truck and appears to be made of high quality parts.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: WONT EVER FULLY FOLD OPEN AND KILLS BED-SPACE
customer_reviews.text: If your looking to make your bed smaller and less convenient buy this piece of crap. WHY DOESNT THE SELLER LET EVERYONE KNOW THAT IT CANT BE FULLY OPENED? The last fold is always in the closed position and can’t be opened thusly killing bedspace!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer 1.0

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy install
customer_reviews.text: I told my wife this was the easiest item I've ever installed. Im a handyman so fixing and putting things together is my job. Even with that, I've had many things not work as described and I had to improvise to make it work. This was about 15 min after looking over the clear instructions to complete. Its only been on two days so not sure about how dry it will be but sure looks tight to me. Im very happy with this especially since a local shop with near identical product would have charged just under $600 for this. Get one, you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit a 2019 Ram
customer_reviews.text: This came without instructions and was missing parts. They delayed delivery twice so by the time it got to us there was no time to return since we needed it for a trip. Three hours into the installation we realized it doesn't fit our 2019 Ram since the box rails slope outward it will not latch. We thought maybe in addition to missing screws it must be missing some shims that make it work on our truck. This product was sold as fitting our truck but it doesn't. So far, dealing with Amazon and the manufacturer has been a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on 2018 Ram 1500
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Looks nice and clean once installed. My only recommendation for the manufacturer would be to make it about an inch wider overall. In order for the latch to work, I had to bring the side bars in about 1/4" on each side to bring them closer. Due to that, the post holes on the truck bed are 1/8" visible on each side and allow water into the bed. It is a very small amount of water, but none the less, it still gets in. Other than that issue, it looks great and the low cost make this a must have for the 2018 Ram 1500 6.4' bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: Have had this on my Ram 2500 for a little over two years now. I live in south TX. Still holding up strong! The sewing on the top which holds the Velcro strip down is fraying off on one side. The black cover is still dark black and shows no sign of sun damage. 2ys of constant use I am very satisfied and won't hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is a great value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bed cover to keep the weather off luggage, groceries, etc. I wasn't concerned about security, just something that would be secure and fairly weather tight. This cover fits all of my needs, at a good price. It locks down easily, and it seems to be made of good quality materials. Very easy to roll up and I still have use of my full bed. After seeing mine, my neighbor bought one for his truck, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bruski

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!! Easy install!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive tonneau cover for my 2018 Dodge 1500 Quad Cab and came upon this one. I read the reviews and it seemed pretty good although with any item if you look long enough there are also some negative reviews. I ordered this on a Sunday and it was delivered on Wednesday. The installation process took me less than 30 minutes. I had to make minor adjustments to the side rails. Overall I am extremely happy with the look, the price and the installation!!
customer_reviews.author: G-$$$

customer_reviews.title: Not durable. Most likely made for garage kept trucks and rarely drivers
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last a year. Drove from Los Angeles to Florida and it was decent. I barely drive my truck and it still ended up falling apart. I have a Honda as my daily driver so I’m disappointed in the results. Once the sealing flap that meets the top of the truck bed stops staying latched, it’s all down hill from there. Recommend seeking other options
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I had it put on my truck in about 2 hrs because I kept adjusting it to get it perfect. The back guides have moved twice so had to readjust but other than that perfect. I've been using this for over a year with no real problems. Glad that I got it. Matches the truck perfectly and now that I have it I use it more than I really thought that I would.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Nice, attractive, easy to install, inexpensive cover.
customer_reviews.text: It fits. It keeps things dry. It is black and my truck is red so it looks good. I needed extra weatherstripping to close a gap and it came right away. Obviously being vinyl it won't keep anyone determined out, but if you are in the market for an inexpensive bed cover that keeps rain out and at least makes it inconvenient for someone to get in, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Cover in box was not the product on the box label
customer_reviews.text: Says it would fit the Ram Rebel with the short box (5.8 ft). The product that showed up came is a box with the proper part number on it for what I ordered. What was in the box was not for the truck as specified. The cover was about 8 inches too long and about 4 inches too wide. Also the canvas really didn't seem that tough. Should have known the price was too good to be true. Waiting on return from Amazon for 3 weeks now. Ordered a name brand cover and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my truck about a year ago. It has held up very well, looks like new after multiple carwashes, and a New England winter. It's almost completely waterproof, very little gets in the truck bed, and only if I run it through a carwash. I have taken it off a few times to move large items in the truck, easy process. Last time, I noticed that the wing nuts that hold the cover on up front were hard to turn, I think they are stripping a bit. I contacted MaxMate, they sent new parts quickly, I will be in great shape now - Thank you very much. Dave
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: The rear latches are very difficult to work and it's already broken on one side after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rotthoff

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...go with a tri fold from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t clamp rail to bed properly,poor clamp design for the ram dt bed. When I finally gave up on the product it was too late to return. Guess it’s my fault for trying to make it work. Also the Velcro will destroy your fingers when adjusting it after having it rolled open. Roll Up design sucks if you actually open your bed top.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money I was more than pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many tonneau covers over the years honestly this was as good as any and at less than half the cost. The latch set up is plastic up at the tailgate but I have seen that on some expensive ones. Fit like a glove and appears to be made out of at least good quality materials. For the price you can’t beat it compared to the stock cover and it even came with Storage bag!! The light that came with it was lame but the cover gets an A
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover for my truck mainly to keep the snow out and it did a fantastic job whilst also looking fantastic. The cover is sleek and low profile adding a nice clean look to the truck. It keeps everything inside dry except for when going through a carwash (some water comes in the sides from the pressure) the customer service is amazing and the warranty is actually claimable which is something a lot of products can't say.
customer_reviews.author: moleman

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase iv ever made on Amazon, use my garage feature to look for a bed cover it said it fit my truck when it showed up it was a foot short. Try to return the bed cover the seller will not issue a return label, personal cost to ship it back to CA from TN is 253$, I only played 209$ for the cover. No help from Amazon at all.... Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Sliger

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit, pass
customer_reviews.text: Product seems decent overall. Problem is, it doesn't fit. The cross bars are too narrow and fall between the rails. I followed directions to the T. Got the tape measure out to make sure it wasn't me. I contacted seller. No response. Unfortunately, back it goes. 2009 Dodge Ram 2500 6'4" box. Roll up tonneau cover.
customer_reviews.author: toddr

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover on December 17th 2015 and I am still in love with it. Easy to install and remove for whatever you need. It has great coverage and protects items in my bed from the rain well. The cover has been beaten up from 110 degrees to 28 and it still looks and works great. So happy I bought it. I had one issue where the metal bar bent on the rear latch and they sent me a new one no questions asked. Great customer service and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install for a Covered Secured Dry Bed
customer_reviews.text: Cover looks great, very easy to assemble and install with one person, and it rolls up/snaps tight covering the bed and everything in it. Came with all the hardware and even the weather stripping for the front of the bed. For the $150 this cover costs, it's cheaper than the hardware for other covers. Good quality fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2019 Ram rebel crew cab. This works great and so much lower cost compared to a "truxedo" brand. Im glad I bought this one. It fits great. Went through car wash to test the waterproof. Only had some leakage close the cab where there is a small opening between the mount and truck bed.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Great Rollup Bed Cover
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Rolls up nicely and I don't lose bed space when it's rolled up. For the most part, it has also kept the elements from getting inside the bed of my truck when it's closed. I feel that for the price of the cover, the quality so far is excellent, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: tsimp

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed to move out of state in a hurry, I needed an economical solution to be able to keep cargo dry in my 13-year-old Ram. This cover was about the cheapest available, so I took a shot. I was able to install it, alone in about 15 minutes and it worked great moving my stuff and keeping them dry on what turned out to be 300 miles of rain & fog.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. Holena

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: after installing this cover we were in Colorado for vacation in very heavy snow and -temps for over 8 days. it worked great and was easy to install, no water or snow ever got into the back or our pickup. great product I highly recommend this top.
customer_reviews.author: John Grose

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit properly.
customer_reviews.text: The width of the tarp is not wide enough to completely secure the rear locking system. I had to adjust the sides bracket bringing them in closer to the edge so the bracket can securely lock. However, if I shake it, the locking system come up open. I have a 2014 RAM, 1500.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I read some good reviews on this so I decided to give it a try. Its complete garbage. spend the money and get a decent name brand. It never latched properly. cheap thin material rips if you look at it the wrong way. This morning I was going down the highway and it unlatched and the Velcro didn't hold it down. It blew around like a kite in the wind before I could pull over it completely destroyed itself.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT BANG FOR YOUR BUCK.
customer_reviews.text: I Just received this yesterday and installed it this morning, very happy so far. EASY to.install. took literally 15 mins or less to install. Only need 2 tools. A Phillips tip screwdriver and a 10mm socket. Fit and finish was actually way better than I expected just a little adjustment on the rail positioning by the tailgate, and it now fits like a glove. I definitely recommend this based on what I see so far. I'll update if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Very Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this on my 2012 Ram 1500 today. I would rate this 10 stars if I could. It was so easy to install...even if you are a complete idiot you can install this. It took no time at all. And it looks great. The engineering and design of this product is top notch. Couldn't be happier with my purchase. Updated Review: Still very happy with my purchase. We live in NH and it's been below zero for a number of days recently. In the extreme cold the cover still functions perfectly. It has also supported several inches of snow with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mike DiStasio

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think about it, just do it!
customer_reviews.text: I sat and looked at this and other covers for a couple weeks before pulling the plug in this one. I finally purchased a “Like new” one from amazon warehouse deals for about $170 and wow, WHAT A DEAL! This is a VERY well built cover. Goes on in 10 minutes and comes with a bag in case you want to take it off and store it for any reason. I believe it will last at least 5-6 years in the weather. If not longer. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: What the hell
customer_reviews.text: Just order this to replace my older one. The length is right but it will not close down on its self. It's like the cover is too short for its own frame. 2007 Dodge ram 1500.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: This cover was super easy to install. It took me about 40 minutes. The locking mechanism is also great as it makes the cover tight when you lock it down. It seems to be keeping the rain out very well. Looks good and is super easy to roll up when you need to. If you're looking for a tonneau cover, I would highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this right before vacation. Quick delivery. Exceptional fit and finish. Took 20 minutes to install. Like others, I also was concerned due to brand and low cost. No worries here. Made it through heavy rains and wind and bed stayed dry. Only recommendation would be to also purchase a rear tailgate seal to do a proper job. I am glad I did, no rain or dust in bed. Only thing left is to see how it weathers over time. Mine will be in garage but this would be a concern of mine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah brandon

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Husband was looking for a bedcover and kept coming back to this one because of the other reviews. It arrived and he had it installed within 30 minutes! Nothing super hard or lengthy. Such a great bedcover and we wish we would have purchased it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: browneyes825

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I drive over 200 miles with it going 75mph+ and it held up very well. It also rained on us quite a few times and no leakage & decent wind during it too! We did use the weather strip because we had a gap prior to my trip. The install wasn’t too bad at all, easy to roll up as well. Happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FOR THE PRICE! BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at the quality of this tonneau cover. Super easy to install. Quality is superb. Arrived very well packaged with a great storage cover. I used the supplied weather stripping near the cab and the rest of it seemed water tight on my 2017 Ram 1500. I was proved right during two thunderstorms we had the same week I installed it - not a drop of water in the bed. The included light is very cheap and the magnets fell out, but I installed it with the supplied velcro adhesive and it works well. I would recommend this tonneau cover to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: My cover came today for my new Ram Eco Diesel. I am impressed! My last truck had the Mopar version of this cover and this one is every bit as nice as that one yet 1/3 the price. It arrived today in a nice storage bag and went on the truck in 15 minutes. Looks great and fits perfectly. Can't go wrong with this cover!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great cover! Easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product today and couldn’t wait to put it on. It only took me about 30 minutes. Installation was super easy and the instructions were clear. I can’t imagine a better cover for a lower price. After fully installing it I needed to tweak the clamps and connections a little bit, but it was no problem. For the price, if it wears out in a few years, I would definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sager

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and easy install
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this for the price. It fit my RAM perfectly, was very easy to install, looks attractive and seems to be wearing well. I like that you can easily flip one portion up to load the back of the truck, or flip all the way up and secure with the clips if you have a full load. I can't think of any disadvantages.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgal

customer_reviews.text: The product is good and all easy to install but I bought it for A gift and person I bought it for says the water still gets inside the truck bed when it rains even with the seal on. I tried contacting the seller but nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Belen Amador-Solis

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Fits Good, Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a 2019 new style Ram, took about 25 minutes in 40 degree weather. It looks good, fits very nicely, and looks great. I like this cover better than a top brand cover that I have on another truck.
customer_reviews.author: Glt68

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up well at all
customer_reviews.text: Only had this cover for 60 days and water is already puddling up on top of cover. I understand this is a budget cover and was worried about the weight of the snow in the winter but never thought I would have to worry about rain water. Only reason I gave this cover 2 stars instead of one is because it does seem to keep water out of the bed, other wise complete waste of money. Would never buy this product again, shows tons of wear. Once again I have had this product for less than 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've had three high dollar covers and still currently have one on my wife's truck. I purchased this cover for my new truck and love it so far. It was very easy to install and only took about five minutes. The overall quality seems to be on par with the high dollar covers we've purchased in the past. If you need your full bed for hauling big stuff you will have to remove the cover but it's about a 30 second job. This cover also came with a nice storage bag in case you need to remove it. If you are on the fence just buy it. For the money I don't think you could find a better cover.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far I had it on my ram for 8 months. Its already starting to wrinkle. IT also does not lock for some reason it stays open. I don't even use my truck for work it is just parked. Its not like I am doing heavy duty work on it for it to start being like that. It was installed by a professional auto shop. So I payed about 300 dollars with installation and I feel like it is garbage. Also makes too much noise. Max mate can you please answer it sais there is 10 year no hassle warranty. There is no way to get a hold of you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but I blame myself - I should have known better. This cover is very low quality. The latches are plastic and it does not fit very well. Required a lot of "adjustment". It would probably work fine for someone who installs it to cover their bed and rarely rolls it up. I believe with a lot of use it will not last more than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: P. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: So far you can't beat the value. It cost a fraction of what other covers cost and has held up well. It's easy to install but you'll end up adjusting at least once. Other than that I love it. Would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bozie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is fairly nice for the price. I mainly bought it as opposed to others for the metal bed clamps. So far has kept the bed dry but it is not well sealed so I expect water in the bed in a heavy downpour. Main reason for only 4 stars is it is not easy to roll open straight. Then unrolling it to close it I have to pull on each side to make sure the velcro is seated properly.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and a $Good price$
customer_reviews.text: My last truck had a roll up cover and I loved it. Bought this one for my new Ram 3500 8ft box . And this rollup cover is better than my last one. The fit is perfect, better padding where you need it, Clamps are good and strong, And the cover locking device is greatly improved ++++ IT LOOKS GREAT. Came very well packaged. And they give you a LED bed light.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd  Mc

customer_reviews.title: Stitching comes undone; lets rain in at front
customer_reviews.text: As photo shows, the stitching began unraveling during the first year of use, for no apparent reason since it doesn't get opened much -- maybe once every two weeks or so. From the outset rain water has come in under the seal, so the advice from some to add more foam or gasket material is probably necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: This is what my truck was missing! IT was super easy for me to put on on my own! no tools needed, everything was super easy to figure out- hardest part was lining it up to my specifications! Not Tonneau cover is 100% waterproof- but the amount that gets in isn't worth adding extra linings to the edges. Absolutly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a trip from NC to NY. We figured it'd be done by The end of the trip because it was an expensive. But it is still holding strong and still looks really nice. And we have used it for many trips since then.
customer_reviews.author: selina

customer_reviews.title: MILES PER GALLON
customer_reviews.text: Affordable. For this much money, to hard to pass on this price. The installation took about 30 minutes with minor adjustments. My bed has been sprayed with bedliner, however I purchased this for the look, security, and most of all....MPG!!! I have a '14 Ram Quad Cab Big Horn with a 6.4L Hemi that sucks down gas. Before cover was installed, I would get 11.5 to 12 mpg at highway speeds. With the cover on I now get 14 to 17 mpg. Great investment for the look, security, and improved MPG.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wulfman

customer_reviews.title: Good for budget minded people.
customer_reviews.text: Great for on a budget people like me. Stays in place but the back does pop up one side. Doesn’t seem to effect the overall performance but it does bug me a little. Rolling it up can be a bother compared to other more expensive models but nothing you can’t get used too with a little time. Other then that it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: Ok. We used this to go from upstate ny to south Florida. Stayed completely dry no issues. 3 stars because the drivers side front clamp stripped and just spun. We still made it home fine 1300+ miles. I returned it. Also led light was missing from package.
customer_reviews.author: Paulb

customer_reviews.title: 08 Ram 1500 Quad Cab/ 6ft Bed
customer_reviews.text: GREAT COVER! I can't believe I waited this long before my purchase! Very short shipping time, packaging was great, and quality of all parts is awesome. It was a breeze to install with a few simple tools and one person. Update: I've had the cover on for a few months now and am very impressed at how it's holding up. Still looks like new. Very nice to be able to roll away when I need the bed space.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Very good bed cover
customer_reviews.text: High quality materials. Fast, easy installation. I'd been looking for a bed cover for a while. This one is half the price and better quality than ones I looked at for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2019 1500 Classic Warlock
customer_reviews.text: While I wasn't expecting much from such a cheap tonneau cover, I did expect it to at least fit. This didn't even come close. I made sure to follow the instructions exactly and it was over and inch too short in width to fit my truck bed. That put aside the cover itself also felt very cheap and I don't think this would last more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I washed my truck for the first time today with the cover and I get water in from the front. Going to contact the company and see what they have for that.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: 2016 Ram 1500 looking good.
customer_reviews.text: Installed by myself under 30 min. looks great been on truck for about 2 months and 3000 miles no issues. So far nearly 95% water tight. That's not he covers fault, water comes in on vertical sided of the tailgate. Nothing from the top.
customer_reviews.author: Justbig

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing, performs great, and simple install!
customer_reviews.text: Long time tonneau cover owner; have had button covers, click and seal, and click and seal hydraulic lift covers. This cover looks really great, no worry about corners coming unsealed, and installs in no time. So far so good, and even got my buddy to buy one after he saw mine. Time will tell, but so far I’m very happy with the look and performance!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Engineer's Review
customer_reviews.text: I've had the topper for 3 weeks now. Overall for the price, this is a great product. All parts are mechanically sound, tight water seal (tested), and material seems to be strong. I will add to this review the longer I have the topper.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I did like the fact the cover came in a travel bag ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly as stated, came with everything as expected. I did like the fact the cover came in a travel bag so if you need to remove the cover from your truck your able to store it and keep it clean. I have a Dodge Ram 155 Quad Cab, the cover looks great. I did have to spend some time adjusting the rails to make sure the latch system for the cover fit correctly. Overall took about 20-30mins to completely install. I do prefer the roll up cover as well because you do gain full access to your truck bed and the cover rolls up for an easy tie off connection.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ladyga

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This cover was very easy to install, looks great, and cost about 1/4 what it would have been to get professional installation. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: D. Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I have a 2014 Dodge Ram 1500 with a 6.4' bed and an "over the rail" toolbox. I purchased the 6.4' cover and modified the cover to meet my needs. Turned out great and it keeps the water and prying eyes out of the bed. If I didn't need to modify it for my needs, this would have taken 3 minutes to install. Very simple. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Overall Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Used this cover on my 2002 Dodge Ram, and overall fit was very good. Install was easy, just took a little adjusting here and there to get it all lined up. No issues with it coming open while driving and seems secure. Giving a 4 star has I have only had it in for a week and unsure on how long it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasey
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, easy assembly really helps the mileage on our 2017 Dodge Ram pickup Excellent customer service! Needed extra nuts/screws,lost ours and they were kind enough to send to us free of charge. Highly recommend this company and product. Stood up to heavy snow fall last winter with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Fits Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt fit well in 2016 Ram 2500. The latches on the rear are cheap. Doesnt latch well. Would be afraid if it was windy It will release. Doesnt seal at all on a dodge tailgate. Would recommend spending alittle more on a name brand one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: Had the same cover on my Nissan Titan for years (bought here) so immediately looked here when I got my Dodge Ram. Easy to install, easy to remove if needed and more importantly I have NEVER experienced a leak, even in heavy rain. I HIGHLY recommend this cover!
customer_reviews.author: James Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first 6 months. Now it won’t stay locked and there is no way to fix it. The cover is constantly unlocking while driving and the back flips up.
customer_reviews.author: kosturia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tonneu cover.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cover for about 9 months now looks very nice on the truck zero water gets inside the bed when it is properly lined up if you have trouble closing the tailgate with the plastic that comes on the factory tailgate unscrew the back clamps one Turn at a time until it closes smoothly. I love my tonneau cover and it folds up easily and is also easily removed. I also recommend buying the 1 at the lower price they are the same cover and you get the Tyger brand when it comes to your door it also includes a cover for the tonneau cover if you decide to store it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rhineberger

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 6 stars I would. The quality of tonneau cover at this price is amazing. I originally bought this for a Ram 1500 and then moved it to a 2017 Nissan Titan.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: fullfilled my son-in-law's christmas list!
customer_reviews.text: this was a christmas gift for my son-in-law and he was thrilled with it. Completed the look for his truck. Very satisfied with the service
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E Austin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The tonneau cover is perfect! Arrived promptly and was exactly as described. It actually looks very nice on the truck!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing this cover. Like others have said, get some weather stripping for the front bulk head as it does not come with any. (2019 ram classic, 6.5 bed) Also, I did not receive MaxMate. They sent me a Tyger brand. Description is the same, just a different name on the cover. Instructions were easy to follow. Two screws, six clamps. No holes in the truck. Pulled everything tight by hand. Overall, very pleased. Will update if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Willis

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but did not fit as it supposed to on my 2008 Dodge Ram sport truck and very noisy do to the width of the cross bars is actually smaller the the truck and not much of a support as it should be.. I may have installed it wrongly but took it to a well known mechanic shop and was told it seem to have a defect.. on my pics it's showing I need to butt up against the cab which causes squeaking when driving and as well as the cross bars not full extend to fit.. wish that there's something that can be done to make it right I'm open to any suggestions OG
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this cover is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: this cover is perfect!!! for the price it can't be beat!! fits perfectly on my 2015 dodge ram 1500 crew cab with the short bed!!! took about 15 minutes alone to install! i would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking at covers. i have already posted on Facebook the before and after pics and alot of my friends are already inquiring about it. i will show it off this wknd while camping!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Folds down tight, latches well and is easy to roll up and secure when not in use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jumpthewake

customer_reviews.title: Very good cover so far.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality cover for the price. It arrived packaged well and it was as delivered quickly. I was able to install on my 2016 RAM 1500 Crewcab in about 30 minutes. Haven’t had it long. I will report again if I have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: RobertK

customer_reviews.title: Quality cover, quality fitment
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Was easy to install. And is made with good quality. It says maxmate, but it came in as tyger. Tyger box, tyger instructions, and tyger logo on the cover. Which is fine by me, cause this was 10$ cheaper than buying from tyger. And I had tyger covers before, they are just as good as any expensive brand! I would buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Works & looks great follow the directions and it will work out perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product so far just installed it needs minor tweaking on the alignment for locking in but looks and fits great..if your having trouble go to YouTube and look up tyger roll up cover..Helped a lot..
customer_reviews.author: Dwright

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement top
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed cover, works well. Replaced a 10 year cover as I'm not convinced I'm keeping the truck. It's light enoughto be completely removed and comes with stowage bag. Bag is okay but probably work last long. When the top is removed it's somewhat cumbersome to store.
customer_reviews.author: Lost dog

product_meta.title: MaxMate Soft Roll Up Truck Bed Tonneau Cover Compatible with 2019-2020 Ram 1500 New Body Style | Fleetside 5'7" Bed | Without Rambox | NOT Compatible with Classic
product_meta.description:
Color:Style: Soft Roll Up| Size:5'7" Bed (2019-2020 New Body Style)


This soft roll up truck bed tonneau cover is manufactured from top quality materials in the industry and designed for easy no-drill installation. The customized fitment will not only give your vehicle a sleek and stylish look but also can help you save up to 13% in gas usage.


FITMENT



 * Truck Bed: Fleetside
 * Bed Length: 5'7"
 * Compatible with 2019-2020 Ram 1500 New Body Style
 * Not compatible for models with Ram Box
 * Cab size does not matter as long as you have the correct model and bed size.
feature_bullets: Cover is dual-coated and made out of heavy duty 24oz. marine-grade vinyl, with built-in horizontal crossbars that offer support when cover is lying flat; and roll up with the tarp to provide full bed access when in need. Also comes with aircraft-grade aluminum side rails, and stainless steel clamps for mounting to the truck bed.

Seals with Velcro strip on the sides and secures with latch lock system at the tailgate. Tension system is available and can be adjusted on the end of the side rails to keep the cover tight and vinyl wrinkle-free in any weather conditions.

Easy no drilling installation with instruction and mounting hardware provided. | NOTE: Small holes will need to be cut in the bedliner for vehicles equipped with over-the-bedrail bedliner to secure the clamps for proper cover installation; cover will work with under-the-bedrail bedliner without modification.
10-YEAR NO-HASSLE WARRANTY! | IMPORTANT: Please measure your truck bed length before ordering! We accept returns; however customer will assume the return shipping cost if ordered wrong.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,730 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
